com.karuslabs.commons.menu.Button

  • Packages that use Button 
    Package Description
    com.karuslabs.commons.menu
    Classes used to build a GUI menu.

    • Uses of Button in com.karuslabs.commons.menu

      Methods in com.karuslabs.commons.menu that return Button 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Button SharedMenu.getDefaultButton()
      Returns the default behavior for when no button has been binded to a slot.
      Methods in com.karuslabs.commons.menu that return types with arguments of type Button 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<Integer,Button> SharedMenu.getButtons()
      Returns the menu's slots and buttons binded to them.
      Map<Integer,Button> Menu.getButtons()
      Returns the menu's slots and buttons binded to them.
      Methods in com.karuslabs.commons.menu with parameters of type Button 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SharedMenu SharedMenu.bind(int slot, Button button)
      Binds a button instance to the specified slot.
      void SharedMenu.setDefaultButton(Button defaultButton)
      Sets the default behavior for slots for which no buttons have been binded.
